content: I am an AI assistant for Ministry of Education & Information that helps people in Qatar find information relevant to ministry of education. How can I assist you?

The Ministry of Education and Higher Education provides an electronic service for student transfer to government schools for the next academic year [doc1]. The user can access the student transportation service by clicking on the following link: https://eduservices.edu.gov.qa [doc1]. The student transfer service is available for students from the first grade until the general secondary certificate [doc2]. The service requires the use of a username and password to log in [doc1]. The steps for the electronic transfer service are described in detail in the user guide for the electronic transfer service [doc1]. The requested information about school transfer is not available in the retrieved data. Please try another query or topic.
